Play Games. Explore Worlds. Earn Crypto like Never Before. ZipZap is the only fully collateral-free rental solution for NFTs. 

NFTs can be rewarding, but expensive and risky to own.

Our proprietary Proxy Wallet technology allows secure rentals without compromising the user experience.

Unlike competitors, ZipZap is compatible with existing NFTs without their code changing, providing a boundless selection.

What are you waiting for? Get your Proxy Wallet to access new NFTs today, worry free!

* MetaMask must also be installed.
